review:
My friend told me about the buffet system at Uppercase Diner. I went there to try it out, with some friends. To my surprise, the place really is wonderful. The food so good, quality so amazing, staff so professional and well behaved, place so beautiful and ambiance so comfortable.
They make such good food and in so decent price. I tried almost every counter, and everything was worth the tempt. Super delicious food and great quality, this place is definitely a must try.‚ù§Ô∏èüëçüèª

review:
I was in Jungpura for some work and got late so i thought of having my lunch there only. I searched on Zomato to find this amazing place by the name of Brosis. This is a cozy place with good interiors. They have a lot of bakery products, Continental and north Indian dishes. I loved their honey ginger tea. It was just perfect. Burger was yummy. It had a very delicious patty and the fries they served it along were crisp. I also had dal makhani and lacha paratha. Dal was thick and creamy. Lacha paratha was also cooked well.
All in all, had a very good experience.
name: Brosis

review: I went for shopping at the mall and it took a lot of time so i ordered my food there only from Caterspoint. I ordered Breakfast Berries Porridge, Tropical Fruit Salad, Pome Orange Blueberry Salad and Orange Dream Creamsicle Smoothie from here. The smoothie had such a refreshing taste. This was the first time that i was trying orange smoothie and i absolutely loved it. Both the fruit salads were totally on point in freshness and the quality of fruits used. As a result, the taste of both the salads was really good. Poreidge had a lot if berries which gave it a nice tangy taste. Not only all the four dishes were delicious but the packaging was also of very good quality. Full five ratings to...read more
name: Caterspoint

review:
My friend n me ordered Mac special pizza and African Peri peri veg pizzas from La Pino'z. We were hungry and hence, were so glad when the pizza got delivered on time. Pizzas were hot and the fresh aroma made our mouths watering. The toppings were abundant and both the pizzas were delicious in taste. It had paneer, mushroom sweet corn paprika and lots of cheese.
Super delicious pizza and super amazing service. One of the best place for pizzas.
name: La Pino'z Pizza

review:
Pizza has always been my comfort food. I have tried it from almost every place. But La Pino'z pizzas has always been favourite place. Their rates are decent, quality is top class and the delivery is made on time. I like the variety of options they offer, and every one of it has different taste with different combinations of toppings, veggies and even cheese.
They are available in different sizes, based on the priority of their customers.
It's a wonderful place with delicious pizzas and amazing services
name: La Pino'z Pizza

review: At my work place I ordered dal tadka, mix veg and butter roti from apna daana pani. Fast delivery and great packaging by them. The mix veg had seasonal, garden fresh veggies with perfect spices and less oil, dal tadka was tasty and butter tawa roti was really home like fresh, medium in size and thin. I am gonna recommend all my family, friends and you guys to try them.
name: Apna Daana Paani

review: Farm veg pizza is my favourite one and i had tried it from various delivery kitchen but pizza factory made it best. Ordered from them and delivery timing was amazingly fast and packaging was good. The pizza had topping of very fresh onion,capsicum, mushroom and tomato, cheese was tasting amazing and crust was thin and crunchy. Definitely deserves to give a try.
name: Pizza Factory

review: I ordered dal tadka, chilli paratha and malai tandoori momos from here. While the name of this outlet suggests that this restro is only for the non-veg food but i am a pure vegetariana nd i really liked their vegetarian food. The dal was very thick and creamy, it had a perfect texture and it tasted amazing. Chilli paratha was properly cooked and it went really well with the dal. Tandoori momos were even better. They had a perfect juicy filling and these were cooked in tandoor. The malai used on top was of really good quality and the taste of these momos was damn good.
name: STC - Singh Tandoori Chicken

review:
Goa means good life good music and some great food sply from our regular life and here this place shows some great effort when it comes kickass food!!
Please try this multicuisine place if u like to experience yumminess
name: SEA

review:
Yesterday ordered dal makhani, soya achari tikka and pudina paratha from Wakhra Punjab. The food was excellent in taste. The pudeena parata was fresh, hot and yummy. It had the proper taste of pudina. The soya achari tikka was tasty too, soya chap had great flavours of pickle, tangy and spicy, very well grilled. Dal makhani was really creamy. Loved it. Packaging was so classy and my order was delivered on time.
Overall, had a good experience.
name: Wakhra Punjab

review: I had been ordering from this delivery kitchen from a very long time. Yesterday i ordered pudina paratha, paneer butter masala, dal makhani and kashmiri pulao from here. The taste was amazing, the pudina paratha had perfect hint of pudina. Dal Malhani was very flavourful, it was creamy, very smooth and tasty. The paneer butter masala was great, paneer was of good quality and the masalas were on point. Prices are also very reasonable.
name: Oh Teri! Indian Kitchen

review:
Recently i was passing through this cute lill place n got my order packed ... too my surprise the place was vegetarian which was a plus point to choose ... everything that i ordered was packed in great package which kept food in good condition.
I recommend to try there pasta in white sauce n pizza which where fresh n tasted heavenly good ..
overall had a great experience would luv to recommend n try again soon cost 2 people approximately rs 500.
name: Jia Mom's

review: While coming back from work I was starving. So I decided to take away a veg jeena burger with dilli 6 fries and mango moose from Burger Singh: Big Punjabi Burgers. They made my order very fast. The burgers was tasty, the patty was crispy and delicious. The dilli 6 fries were spicy and crispy and went really well with the cheesy dip. And the mango moose was heaven in taste with realy mango chunks. It was a great meal.
name: Burger Singh - Big Punjabi Burgers

review: I went to Dhaba 29 with my family as we wanted to something desi. We liked the place as it has some decent outdoor d√©cor and desi touch. We ordered bajre ki khichdi, sangre ki sabzi, haryanvi kadhi with dal makhani, garlic naan and lehsun ki chutney. The food was served quick, hot and fresh. These were authentic desi dishes but still were quite presentable. The plating was great. I really liked the Haryanvi Kadhi, it had an amazing taste. The kadhi was tangy and spicy and it was so different than the normal kadhi. The chutney was just perfect. All in all it was great experience dining there. Good service and damn good food.
name: Dhaba 29

review: Sometimes while in office I order my food from this place named Fu.kin and it always deliver me good quality delicious food. What i like the most in their menu is their spring rolls and their dimsums. Their spring rolls has aspicy flavourful filling and these are so crisp fried yet very less oily. Their dimsums have a soft covering while the fillings are so yummy. I have orderd tgese two from here so many times and aleays liked the taste. Last time i ordered hot n sour soup as well which was also very delicious in taste. Packing is also good here and so is their delivery.

review: If you want to try pocket friendly meals with great taste, than go give a try to pizza factory. Ordered veggie delight pizza from them. The delivery timing was great. Pizza was delicious, the crust was thin, veggies used in it like tomato, corn, jalape√±os,capsicum, tomato, olive, corn, red paprika was damn fresh not at all stale. The cheese was great too. review:

I am fan of tikka junction Have already tried their kirti nagar,rajouri garden, malviya nagar,jail road and karkardooma outlet so this time decided to try their new outlet in dwarka sector 4 and this joint has never disappointed me.Finger licking dishes serves both quality and quantity.

review: Northern knight is my only saviour whenever I crave for thai cuisine. I usually order red thai curry with chilli garlic noodles. And that is most of the time my usual order. review:

Prices were also decent and the delivery was timely. Must try place.

review: I'm a big fan of thai cuisine and one of my favourite thai restaurants is Wai Yu Mun Ching. Yeah, the name itself signifies it's authenticity. I have been here many a times and every time this place surprises me with its delicious food. I have had their seven happiness soup which has seven exotic veggies, crispy thread paneer which is my absolute favorite, chicken lollipop in red spicy sauce and balinese pot chicken which is actually chicken in brown sauce, lemon grass and ginger. It tastes heavenly. This place gives you an authentic thai food experience and one must surely try this place out

review: I'm glad I ordered my food from Think Asia this afternoon. The beat part of their extensive menu since I was ordering for one person I decided to stick to their Asparagus Sushi and Thai Green Curry Box. The packaging was leak proof and the portion size is enough for 1.

The packaging is also pretty good and their delivery is also pretty fast. What else to say about them ,this place is just perfect.

review: Ice pice serves the best milk shakes in the city, I can bet on that. Each and every milk shake they make is so sumptuous that you would crave for more. .
.

Lotus stems were crisp and the mix of honey and chilli gave it a truly delicious taste. The portion of both the dishes qas also pretty much considering the pocket friendly prices.
name: Say Chinese

review:
The place is located in Janpath went for casual lunch with few friends . From starters to sweet dish everything was great so as the hospitality of the place . Loved there dahi kebabs n Hara bhara kebabs it had nutty crunch .
Dal is also to delicious n mushroom masala is definitely not to be missed.
Overall great experience.!!
name: Punjab Grill

review:
I had a good experience with their outlet. The food was nicely packed and delivered on time.
I order Paneer makhni and kadhai paneer.
The Paneer makhni was really creamy and flavourful. Kadhai paneer was spicy and cooked with perfection. Both the curries tasted really delicious. Had these with garlic naan which was also cooked really well. The quality of the food as well as the quantity was really satisfying considering the low prices.
Overall a nice place to order good food from.
name: Spoon & Chopsticks

review:
Recently ordered Biryani combo from this place . Was amazed to the neatness that's a great way to deliver food .
Ordered subz biryani lthat came in clay pot covered with dough layer which kept it warm ....
Also luved there aam Panna n thandai which gave a great kick to scrumptious meal.
Overall I had great experiences in terms of service, place is totally value for money!!
Recommended!!
name: Biryani Central

review: I picked up a spicy paneer sandwich and avocado smoothie from here. Sandwich was made using whole wheat bread and it had a lot of paneer along with onion, corn and cheese. It was quite big in size, healthy and yumm. Smoothie had a very soothing flavour of avocado with a hint of spinach. It was made using low fat milk.
name: Bunk Junk

review:
I ordered food from bukhrat today and the food was outstanding..from packaging to everything it was great !!
I tried their murg achari tikka and keema kaju mutton with khameeri roti..
The taste wS just too good..the quantity of the food was also decent..
Overall my experience of ordering was good..a must if have oderning in your mind
name: Bukhraat Muglai Food

review: If you are looking for a place to relax and enjoy good food, visit Italiano in Cyber Hub. With a relaxing and comfortable ambience, they provide perfect seating to chill out with buddies. They have good cocktails and their food is authentic Italian which almost everyone loves. Recommended.
name: Italiano

review:
Started my meal here with Tiranga Pav Bhaji. It was a very interesting dish because it had three different kinds of bhaji. The one with green colour had spinach in it and it was the first time i had pav bhaji with flavour of spinach and it tasted really yumm. Then i had the veg cheese toast sandwich which was quite big in size and had loads of cheese. It also tasted really good. In the end i had veg kofta milan along with butter parantha. Soft koftas were made in a rich creamy gravy and these tasted so good with the butter parantha.
Liked all the three dishes that i had here. Great food, great service.
name: Achija

review: It is a south Indian restaurant that is good to visit with family and friends. I went to this place with my mom and dad and had a lovely time here. The ambience was simple but comforting, the waiters were very attentove and the food was really delicious. We had a dosa and an uthapam. Dosa was crisp and the masala filling inside was really yummy. Sambar was tangy and flavourful. Uthapam was perfectly cooked and had a nice taste of onion and tomatoes. Satisfactory food. Will visit again.
name: Sankalp

review:
On my way back to home from Gurgaon, I couldn‚Äôt resist picking a few thick-shakes from here.

Kitkat shake was made using a lot of kitkat chocolates which was very much evident in every bite of it.
name: Ice Pice

review: This place is my new favourite for pizzas. They have a lot of varieties in non-veg pizzas and their pricing totally justifies the size and quality these guys are providing, not to forget the scrumptous taste. Another plus point is their super fast delivery so if you are having sudden hunger pangs, you can order from here and within 20-25 minutes you will get your hands a hot delicious pizza.
name: The Italian Job

Cheese Pav Bhaji was literally loaded with cheese and even if you take out the cheese topping, the bhaji itself was super delicious and had enough cheese in it as well. The Pavs were done in a lot of butter as well. We also had Paneer Fried Rice after it and these were even more delicious. The overall flavours were mindblowing. The delivery was quick and hassle free. This is going to be my go-to choice whenever I am in West Delhi! Next, I am going to try the Chinese combos because the pictures look lip smacking.
